Description: An earring of twisted gold wire with a terminal in the form of the head of a ram, with horns and collar. The eyes were hollow for inlays. One of a pair with 1952,1213.8
Exhibition history: 2023 4 May - 13 Aug, London, BM, G35, Luxury and Power: Persia to Greece
Acquisition name: Donated by: Mrs Marion Whiteford Acworth JP
